item.title: [OOZIE-477] Adding configurable filesystem support instead of hardcoded "hdfs"
item.description: This allows for configurable filesystem support in Hadoop 23 and not only "hdfs://".
item.summary: Adding configurable filesystem support instead of hardcoded "hdfs"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Since this includes support for filesystems other than hdfs (why was there a check for this in the first place?) my company would like to see that part get integrated.
The check was to avoid people running WFs from Oozie server local file system.
Ah - makes sense.
